course.title: ADM 4337 Managing Change (3 units)
course.desc: Strategic management of change in organizations: change agent-client relationships, managing large scale systems change, process consulting skills, intervention techniques and change management, evaluation of change efforts and effectiveness.Course Component: LecturePrerequisites: ADM 2336. Course reserved for students: in a B.Com. who completed at least 33 units from ADM core courses, including ADM 2381; in minors or in certificate programs when the course is required.
